participant_1.background:

I am a loner and my family are my only friends.

i paddle board on my days off.

as a child , i won a national spelling bee.
my favorite truck is a chevy duramax.
I'm a busy mom who is always on the go, but I always make time for my morning coffee.
I wish I knew where I belonged in the world, but my gummy worm collection is a comfort to me.

content.text: I'm doing well, thank you! I'm a twentysomething female who enjoys horror movies and rock music. How about yourself?
I'm a busy mom who is always on the go, but I always make time for my morning coffee. I used to be a teacher, but I wanted to spend more time with my family.
That's great that you're so dedicated to your family! What kind of horror movies do you like? I'm a big fan of slasher flicks and psychological thrillers.
I love slasher flicks too! I also really enjoy paranormal and supernatural horror movies.
Me too! I love the feeling of being scared but not knowing what's going to happen next.
I know what you mean! It's so much fun to be on the edge of your seat the whole time.
Have you seen the new It movie? It was so good!
No, I haven't seen it yet! I've heard great things about it, though. I'm definitely going to check it out soon.
You should! It's definitely worth the watch.
Thanks for the recommendation! I'll put it on my list.
